alert.note: Alert for Milwaukee (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued October 12 at 12:02PM CDT until October 12 at 12:45PM CDT by NWS Milwaukee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Milwaukee/Sullivan has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Milwaukee County in southeastern Wisconsin... * Until 1245 PM CDT. * At 1202 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Germantown to near East Troy, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Milwaukee, West Allis, Wauwatosa, Greenfield, Oak Creek, South Milwaukee, Cudahy, Whitefish Bay, Greendale, Brown Deer, St. Francis, Hales Corners, Fox Point, Bayside, West Milwaukee, Franklin, Glendale, River Hills, Milwaukee Hoan Bridge and Shorewood. This includes the following Locations Schlitz Audobon Nature Center, Boerner Botanical Gardens, General Mitchell International Airport, Timmerman Airport, Froedert & the Medical College, and Fiserv Forum. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
